extension.summary: A feature rich and fully customisable skin
extension.description: Madnox stands for eye candy and customisation. There are many different views and options to present your media in the way you want it. All views are fully customisable. You can change the look with different styles, themes and options.
extension.disclaimer: Madnox is the successor to Aeon Madnox by Mike_Doc, schimi2k and MeowMoo. It is a skin based on the design of Aeon by djh_ and Aeon Nox 4 by BigNoid and phil65. All credits to the makers of these skins and mods.
